Type.Name: Void

TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential sealed serializable Void extends System.ValueType

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Indicates a method that does not return a value; that is, the method has a return type of .

remarks.para: This class is used by types in the Reflection Library.
